Welcome to ECE229 New York Airbnb Recommendation’s documentation!¶

This project is a New York House Price Recommendation and Prediction System.

The main purpose is to help travelers, long-term tenants, and landlords understand the housing rental trend in NYC and locate their desired offers, either to stay for a few nights or to optimize the pricing strategy for their own properties.

Package Dependencies¶

The project depends on flask, numpy, pandas, scikit-learn and bokeh, etc. The packge version is listed below:

For Data Analysis:

->bokeh                         2.4.3
->numpy                         1.22.4
->pandas                        1.4.2

For Prediction:

->scikit-learn                  1.1.1
->pandas                        1.4.2
->numpy                         1.22.4

For Test:

->coverage                      5.1
->pytest                        5.0.1
->numpy                         1.22.4
->pandas                        1.4.2

Data Visualization¶

viz_FilterbyText.pipeline_new.donut(dataset)¶

Plot the donut chart to visualize the percentage of room types in the selected regions.

Parameters

dataset (pandas DataFrame) – dataset to visualize

Returns

a donut chart visualizing the percentage of room types

Return type

rendered image

viz_FilterbyText.pipeline_new.visualize_count(filtered_dataset)¶

Visualize the count of listings based on the user inputs, using hexbin map.

Parameters

filtered_dataset (pandas DataFrame) – filtered dataset for mapping

Returns

a rendered bokeh hexbin map based on inputs

Return type

bokeh map objects

viz_FilterbyText.pipeline_new.visualize_price(filtered_dataset)¶

Visualize the average price of listings based on the user inputs, using hexbin map.

Parameters

filtered_dataset (pandas DataFrame) – filtered dataset for mapping

Returns

a rendered bokeh hexbin map based on inputs

Return type

bokeh map objects

Result Prediction¶

The actual application to generate analysis and render the pages.

Returns

rendered webpages

Return type

rendered html

application.get_ng_dict(df)¶

Get the dictionary of neighbourhoods based on the input regions.

Parameters

df (Pandas DataFrame) – DataFrame to select from.

Returns

the dictionary of neighbourhoods in the selected regions.

Return type

dictionary

Read the CSV files into a Pandas DataFrame.

Parameters

Returns

a Pandas DataFrame of the inputed files.

Return type

None

Return type

Plot the map of offerings (points) using the updated visulization and NLP processed dataframe.

Selects data according to the parsed attributes and ranges.

  • ranges (list) – list of ranges of attributes

Returns

the selected DataFrame

Return type
